titleStmt.title: Astrologia restaurata, or, Astrologie restored being an introduction to the general and chief part of the language of the stars : in four books ... / by VVilliam Ramesey, Gent. ...
titleStmt.author: Ramesey, William, 1627-1675 or 6.
Ramesey, William, 1627-1675 or 6. Introduction to the iudgement of the stars.
Ramesey, William, 1627-1675 or 6. Introduction to elections.
Ramesey, William, 1627-1675 or 6. Astrologia munda.

notesStmt.note: "An introduction to the iudgement of the stars", "An introduction to elections," and "Astrologia munda" each have special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
Pages 327-328 are torn in the filmed copy. Pages 314-333 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
